attributes.action: Force the Health Service to treat all Back Injuries.
attributes.additional_details:
There are thousands of people in the country that are being denied treatment to cure their back injury, there are cures but the Health Service turn a blind eye to all the pain and the effect on their quality of life.
It is the only area that once you receive a diagnosis you are tied up in paperwork and dead end after dead end, resulting in loss of job, loss of income and any chance unless you go private of getting your life back.
With the attempted reduction of benefit payments this is a stupid decision that only reduces people to claiming the benefits the government is trying to cut.
